task.title: How to Create an Instructional Video
task.shortdesc: Here are some summarized steps on the process of creating an effective instructional video.

ul.li: whatever materials are needed to complete your actual task

context.p: The following tips should be of aid for anyone trying to create a "how-to" video.

step.cmd: Introduce the task you are demonstrating.
Demonstrate the steps with brevity, and remember the concept that "Actions speak louder than words."
Stay consistent with rhetorical and visual structure.
Test the timing so the audience can easily follow along.
Ensure that the recording has clear quality regarding both visual and audio respects.
